to Aezuregos & DrWrong:

If you already have the codecs then you can convert the entire file to DVD now it depends on the program that you use, for example, using Sony DVD Architect may need to convert the file to a supported file (I've had some errors using .mp4 with DVD Architect even with the latest version).

My advise would be to use Nero Vision, it can use any codec that you have on your computer, for more info you can try asking or searching on http://codecs.freeforums.org/
so you can learn more about what codecs are and the best way to configure them.

Hope this info can lead you to answer your questions.
